com.djrapitops.nmplayer.fileutils

Class PlaylistFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.djrapitops.nmplayer.fileutils.PlaylistFileManager

  • public class PlaylistFileManager
extends Object
    This class is used to write .txt files inside the /playlists/ folder.

    The .txt files contain absolute file paths to the .mp3 files used by the program.

    All the methods are static.

    Author:
    Rsl1122

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlaylistFileManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String getKnownPlaylists()
      A Method used to get a Comma separated list of playlist in the playlists folder.
      static File getPlaylistFolder()
      Creates the playlists folder if it doesn't exist and returns it.
      static List<String> load(String name)
      Reads the contents of {name}.txt and places them in a List.
      static List<String> loadAll()
      Used to load the All playlist, which includes tracks in tracks folder and other playlists.
      static boolean save(List<String> filepaths, String name)
      Saves the {filepaths} list to a {name}.txt file.
      static boolean save(List<Track> playlist, String name, boolean ok)
      This method is used to translate a List containing Track objects into a List containing absolute file paths as string before saving them to the approppriate file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlaylistFileManager

        public PlaylistFileManager()

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public static boolean save(List<String> filepaths,
                           String name)
        Saves the {filepaths} list to a {name}.txt file.

        If playlists folder doesn't exist it will be created.

        If a file with the name exists inside the folder, it's contents will be overwritten.

        Parameters:
        filepaths - a List containing filepaths to .mp3 files inside the playlist.
        name - Name of the playlist, and the name of the .txt file
        Returns:
        Success of the save.

      • getPlaylistFolder

        public static File getPlaylistFolder()
        Creates the playlists folder if it doesn't exist and returns it.
        Returns:
        The playlists folder.

      • load

        public static List<String> load(String name)
        Reads the contents of {name}.txt and places them in a List.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the playlist, and the name of the .txt file.
        Returns:
        List containing all the lines inside the file.

      • loadAll

        public static List<String> loadAll()
        Used to load the All playlist, which includes tracks in tracks folder and other playlists.
        Returns:
        List of filepaths to every track known by the player.

      • save

        public static boolean save(List<Track> playlist,
                           String name,
                           boolean ok)
        This method is used to translate a List containing Track objects into a List containing absolute file paths as string before saving them to the approppriate file.
        Parameters:
        playlist - List containing Track objects, which file paths are to be saved.
        name - Name of the playlist, and the name of the .txt file.
        ok - A value used to separate the method from the other save method.
        Returns:
        Success of the save.

      • getKnownPlaylists

        public static String getKnownPlaylists()
        A Method used to get a Comma separated list of playlist in the playlists folder.
        Returns:
        Playlists, for example "All, TestPlaylist, Small"
